title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to set forth and codify
administration by the New York State Urban Development Corporation of the
minority and women revolving loan trust fund ("Trust Fund") authorized by
chapter 54, section 1 of the Laws of 1991 and chapter 54, section 3 of the Laws
of 1991. The purpose of the trust fund is to authorize administering
corporations, selected by the corporation, to administer trust fund proceeds to
assist eligible businesses in succeeding, surviving and growing in the State. The trust fund program will also seek to establish affirmative action goals for
participation in projects by minority persons and women. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

4215.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
